    C

    Card - Class in logic.cards
    Base abstract class for all cards used in the game's combat system.
    Card(int) - Constructor for class logic.cards.Card
    Constructs a card with the specified rarity.
    cardCount - Variable in class logic.gamesystem.GameLogic.RewardInfo
    How many cards the player may pick.
    cast() - Method in class logic.cards.Attack
    Executes the attack effect.
    cast() - Method in class logic.cards.Card
    Executes the card's effect.
    cast() - Method in class logic.cards.Heal
    Attempts to heal the player.
    cast() - Method in class logic.cards.Magic
    Attempts to cast the magic attack.
    cast() - Method in class logic.cards.Special_Effect
    Applies a status effect based on rarity.
    clear() - Method in class logic.gamesystem.DeckPool
    Removes all cards from the pool.
    CongratView - Class in application
    The CongratView class represents the victory screen displayed when the player wins a battle.
    CongratView(Main) - Constructor for class application.CongratView
    Constructs a CongratView, builds its UI, and immediately plays the victory sound.
    createNew() - Method in class logic.cards.Attack
    Creates a new Attack card with the same rarity.
    createNew() - Method in class logic.cards.Card
    Creates a new card instance of the same type and rarity.
    createNew() - Method in class logic.cards.Heal
    Creates a new Heal card instance with the same rarity.
    createNew() - Method in class logic.cards.Magic
    Creates a new Magic card with the same rarity.
    createNew() - Method in class logic.cards.Special_Effect
    Creates a new Special_Effect card with the same rarity.
